localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: AmzChart is a free analytics tool to help scale your Amazon business. It can save your time to find lucrative niches and get insight into the most profitable niche markets on Amazon.
nodes.title: AmzChart - Powerful analysis tool to scale your Amazon business
nodes.author: Ali R. Tariq

nodes.excerpt: Bird Buddy is a smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors, captures their photos and organizes them in a beautiful collection.
nodes.title: Bird Buddy - A smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: GlamAR is a virtual makeup try-on, designed for beauty and cosmetic brands. Integrate with your brand website or app to help customers try-on products live, directly from their mobile or laptop.
nodes.title: GlamAR - Augmented Reality platform for a seamless try on experience
nodes.author: Farooq Adam

nodes.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
nodes.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job
nodes.author: Michael Samoylov

nodes.excerpt: Step aside fantasy football! There's a new way to play. Draft members of Congress for your team, score points from their actions, and get the most points during your season to win. Fantasy Congress is a blast with friends, and you might learn a thing or two!
nodes.title: Fantasy Congress - Fantasy sports for U.S. politics
nodes.author: Allison Seboldt

nodes.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
nodes.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett
nodes.author: Younghwi Cho

nodes.excerpt: Grow your agency faster with a one-stop solution to manage your leads, proposals, clients, and invoices. Create customizable proposals, close deals quickly, and receive faster payments from your clients.
nodes.title: Clientjoy - Manage leads, proposals, clients, invoicing and revenues
nodes.author: Stephen Campbell

nodes.excerpt: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
nodes.title: Probe - Calculate your SaaS metrics with one click in Google Sheets
